sentences.en: I'm not a very good mathematician.
sentences.cn: 我不是一个非常善作数字计算的人。

sentences.en: This untutored mathematician had an obsession with numbers.
sentences.cn: 这位未接受过正式教育的数学家对数字十分痴迷。

sentences.en: Although Einstein was the better physicist, Hilbert was the better mathematician.
sentences.cn: 尽管爱因斯坦是更好的物理学家，但希尔伯特是更好的数学家。
